name: Rounded New Facebook ( or Facebook 3 ) tabs
description:
Very very simple style. All it does is round the corners on the tabs in you profile.

15-02-09 (DD/MM/YY)
Fixed the main feed tabs.

13-09-08 (DD/MM/YY) 
Update: Added support for home page main feed tabs. Comments are now in the CSS. If there are any tabs that I've missed give me a shout and I'll fix it.
